description:
She is the daughter of the Cang Yue Kingdom’s head general – Wu Ruo Jun, with extraordinary martial talents, yet was unfortunate to be befallen with the extermination of her clan. Although disguised as a man, and taking on an alias identity as Shang Jun, and living together with her younger sister while depending on each other, and on the way hiding the urge to seek revenge. She meets Mu Rong Shu Qing, establishes the Misty Hills Estate, and have been taking a stand in resisting Cang Yue.

He is the mysterious prince of Hai Yu – Qin Xiu Zhi, gentle as jade, deeply infatuated in love. Him who have been in exile for a long time had fallen in love with Shang Jun at first sight, but has suffered because of Shang Jun’s male identity, unable to confess, can only stay besides her the whole way, never leaving and never abandoning.

He is the third young master of Cang Yue’s wealthy merchant – Xiao Zong Qing, with a sunny personality, but also overbearingly unreasonable. He had met Shang Jun in a thieve’s den, and under a rainstorm in the raging waves of the sea had sprouted feelings for Shang Jun. For Shang Jun he willingly gives up everything, his love seeping deep into his bone marrows.>
